element:
http://www.xulplanet.com/tutorials/xultu/introxbl.html http://www.xulplanet.com/reference/elemref/ref_xblbindings.html The root node of an XBL file. It should contain one or more xbl tags.
A unique identifier so that you can identify the bindings with. You can use this as a parameter to getElementById and other DOM functions and to reference the element in style sheets.
